# Exercise 1

Install and load the following packages

**{tidyverse}**
**{admiral}**
**{dplyr}**
**{tidyr}**
**{admiral.test}**

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true" code-summary="Show solution"}
#installing the packages
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "admiral", "dplyr", "tidyr"))

library(tidyverse)
library(admiral)
library(admiral.test)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```
:::



# Exercise 2
Import  `adsl.sas7bdat` as adsl

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true" code-summary="Show solution"}
adsl <-  haven::read_sas("data/adsl.sas7bdat")
```
:::
